OOC:My email is down, so I'm useing egroups. SoulStice, Hot Rod is 
drunk, in his room, at the Alliance base.

::DrillBit::

He didn't have a clue what was going on, so he just kept quiet, and 
observed.

::Hot Rod::

He woke up with a bad hangover. He couldn't get the sight of Feline's 
dead parts out of his mind. He walked out of the base, transformed, 
and headed back to the battle.

::Demolition::

He was in gestalt leg mode, connected to the torso. He waited for the 
others to connect, so as War Machine, they could finish this.
